channel.title: Throne of Lies FM - Game Over (Mafia and Ritualist WIn)- 5/16
channel.description:
[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/NVMYKdqCq25O85BZ6ztaOMX1H5LUXnwAwzqz5J8RkvXtVRsQSSiHCH70Wfzqn84OGzKE0XpObigSnmRe5zuui-OKNiVfW62plg6-uR-yWlP8HLpS-2brpyUFd9UqXT1Hjtllvl2c5To[/img]
[u]Rules[/u] 1. Obey all general Forum rules. 2. The uninformed majority is called the [color=steblue]**BLUE DRAGON**[/color]. 3. Our scouts are too afraid to tell us who the informed minority are. But they exist. 1. This game is **Explicitly Bastard**. Expect weird mechanics, lies, and fucked up bullshit in general. 4. Due to this game's status as a bastard game, **Wisdom of the Mod** is in play. New players and known slankers will not be allowed to join for the sake of the rest of the players. 1. Majority is disabled. Plurality is enabled. In the case of a tie, the player who recieved more votes first is **Executed**. 1. Days will be 48 hours. Nights will be 24 hours. Unless otherwise stated. 7. You ***may*** communicate with players about the game outside of the game, so long as **Icibalus** is included in this communication at all times. 8. This game is definitely not inspired by [color=gold]**MANTICHORA**[/COLOR] again. That game was called Town of Salem FM. Totally different. [u]Signup[/u] 1. Wazza - Died Day [3] - [color=steblue]**CHRONOMANCER**[/color] 2. Simon - Killed Night [1] - [color=steblue]**SHERIFF**[/color] 3. DatBird - Survived Victorious - [color=red]**CONSIGLIERE**[/color] 4. Italy - Survived Victorious - [color=red]**POACHER**[/color] 5. Marshal - Killed Night [1] - [color=steblue]**PRIEST**[/color] 6. Possessed - Killed Night [6] - [color=steblue]**INQUISITOR**[/color] 7. Arete - Killed Night [3] - [color=steblue]**KNIGHT**[/color] 8. PoisonedSquid - Endgamed - [color=steblue]**DRUNK**[/color] 9. Sulit - Killed Night [5] - [color=steblue]**MAID**[/color] 10. SirDerpsALot - Lynched Day [6] - [color=steblue]**PRINCE**[/color] 11. N.1 - Killed Night [4] - [color=brown]**RITUALIST**[/color] 12. darth_tabor - Lynched Day [5] - [color=steblue]**BUTLER**[/color] 13. Emilia - Lynched Day [4] - [color=steblue]**ALCHEMIST**[/color] 14. Ami - Lynched Day [3] - [color=steblue]**NOBLE**[/color] 15. ZoneQ11 - Endgamed - [color=green]**MEDIUM**[/color] 16. Mist1422 - Lynched Day [2] - [color=red]**GODFATHER**[/color] [u]Lost Souls[/u] - DatBird [u]Watchers of the Night[/u] - Jgoesgaming - Astand - Universal [color=steblue]**It is still dark. Do not post, or DM anybody until day is announced.**[/color]

item.title: Throne of Lies FM - Game Over (Mafia and Ritualist WIn)- 5/16
item.dc:creator: Italy
item.description:
i think i figured out everything ici did to mess with us

  1. Ritualist. Made us think there was a second scum faction.
  2. Claimed that we could submit our actions in our classcard to overwrite any action submission as ‘betrayal’
  3. I am the Poacher. The Poacher. In a mafia team with Consig and Godfather.

Read full topic
